slidelink.displaytext: Overview of the People Investment Process
Where do performance objectives come from?
Where do development objectives come from?
It doesnt end there: ongoing coaching and feedback
Employee view: draft performance objective details
Employee view: review your objectives and submit
Employee view: objective setting is complete
Manager View: review summary and submit objectives
Manager View: objective setting successfully completed
For new hires: launch objective setting
